field.name: Contributor

definition.attribution: Dublin Core Metadata Element Set, Version 1.1: Reference Description at http://dublincore.org/documents/dces/

field.definition: an entity responsible for making contributions to the content of the resource

dos.practice: The name of a contributor should be used to indicate the entity.
For people, include a first and last (family) name in the format of firstname lastname. See examples.
To enter values for multiple people, either repeat this metadata field or create a semicolon separated list. See examples.
To enter an organizational and departmental entity, enter the department first followed by a comma and then the organization.

donts.practice: Do not include person, organization or services involved in creating metadata information.

examples.practice: Multiple person example: Jane Doe; Bill Kelp.
Departmental and organizational entity: Department of Geophysics, Colorado School of Mines.
